entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches developing near midnight. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the afternoon. Periods of snow beginning in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 16 January 2023
